channel.title: Liveblogs on Danganronpa MK2
channel.description: Recent content in Liveblogs on Danganronpa MK2

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 23
item.description: CHAPTER 02 Um, can I ask you something Ibuki? CHAPTER 02 BRING IT ON! Did you play “Twilight Syndrome Murder Case”? Wellllll... that's a computer game, right? I'm basically awful at those things! Ibuki’s a hardliner, so I don't touch anything powered by electricity except electric guitars! CHAPTER 02 .

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 22
item.description: CHAPTER 02 So this... was the real ending? CHAPTER 02 Yeah, that's the "Truth Edition"... The incident's 1st Day and 3rd Day are included in it. Now you’ve seen the entirety of the game’s events, across all four days. I see... It was a lot easier to understand this time. CHAPTER 02 .

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 21
item.description: CHAPTER 02 Okay... so I push “DOWN” five times, right? Let’s give it a try... CHAPTER 02 Twilight Syndrome Murder Case: Truth Edition Ah! The screen changed! Yeah, that’s the real game. Twilight Syndrome Murder Case’s “Truth Edition”. At that moment, I felt my nerves return. This game... it could reveal something about the murder.

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 20
item.description: CHAPTER 02 However, when we finally reached Jabberwock Park... ...a certain someone was waiting for us. CHAPTER 02 Why hello there, Mahiru and Hajime. I'm glad you guys are doing well. Eh!? Nagito!? CHAPTER 02 It feels like... it's been a long time since I was able to talk to you two like this.

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 19
item.description: CHAPTER 02 There’s a sign stuck to this door... It seems to have some English written on it. No way I could read that... CHAPTER 02 You can’t take a shower! The shower’s under repair, so there’s no water coming out of the facets! Ah, so this is a shower room? If it’s out of order, that would explain the illustration on the sign.

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 18
item.description: CHAPTER 02 To begin with... I should look at the new Monokuma File. CHAPTER 02 The victim is Chiaki Nanami. Estimated time of death is around 3:00 p.m.. The scene of the crime where the body was discovered is inside the beach house at Chandler Beach. The cause of death is a single killing blow to the head with a blunt instrument.

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 17
item.description: CHAPTER 02 I couldn’t contain my scream. What I saw in front of me... left me in complete shock. Chiaki Nanamilying dead on the floor... ...covered in blood. CHAPTER 02 Chiaki Nanami... CHAPTER 02 She was really quiet, but... she definitely cared a lot about other people. And that.

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 15
item.description: CHAPTER 02 When I entered the pharmacy, I immediately saw her cowering in the corner. CHAPTER 02 Hiyoko, are you alright? CHAPTER 02 *Sniff*... G... Go away. Leave me alone! Wait, I can’t just- CHAPTER 02 Stop it! Stop talking to me!

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 14
item.description: CHAPTER 02 Ooooo, check out all that coke! CHAPTER 02 Ah! W-Where!? CHAPTER 02 Over there on the table! So many bottles of coke! CHAPTER 02 Oh... Oh, yes... CHAPTER 02 Hehe. Ibuki wants to chug it down right now!

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 13
item.description: CHAPTER 02 Eh!? CHAPTER 02 Woah! Are you for real!? You still came!? CHAPTER 02 I-I thought you were just bluffing! Why would I be bluffing!? CHAPTER 02 Well, you haven’t killed me yet, despite everything! I’ve never even threatened you!

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 12
item.description: CHAPTER 02 Mortal... you dare speak to me alone? What? Should I be scared? Huh? If you think I’m intimidated by you, you need to grow up. Growing up? My soul is decades old... Then maybe you should act like it! CHAPTER 02 Against my better judgment, I stayed by Gundham’s side as he continued to talk about bizarre and nonsensical things.

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 11
item.description: CHAPTER 02 This thing... looks really old. Whatever. I should just beginalready... All I have to do is press “START”, right? CHAPTER 02 ... (Ah, it's already late... I'm gonna be late for our meeting...) (Everyone's waiting... If I'm late... they’re gonna hate me... ) (Um.

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 10
item.description: CHAPTER 02 Oh, hi Mahiru. I wasn’t able to ask at the meeting, but was Nagito alright? Ah... Yeah, he was fine. CHAPTER 02 So he was difficult, but not *too* difficult... at least for you. Eh... did she just read my mind? Speaking of the meeting, will you be coming to Sonia’s party?

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 9
item.description: CHAPTER 02 Hello... Is there something you need? CHAPTER 02 I was about to begin my meditation... Will you be joining me? CHAPTER 02 Not knowing what else to do, I joined Peko in her meditation session. CHAPTER 02 We didn’t share many words... but I feel we got a little bit closer.

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 8
item.description: CHAPTER 02 *Ding dong Bing bong * CHAPTER 02 Ahem... Hope's Peak Academy's School Trip Executive Committee has an announcement to make... Gooooood morning, everyone! Looks like today is gonna be another perfect, tropical day! Now then, let's show some enthusiasm and make sure to give it our all today! CHAPTER 02 I better head over to the restaurant.

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 7
item.description: CHAPTER 02 Yahoo! I'm the first one here! The curry's all mine! ...She didn’t fall for that, did she? CHAPTER 02 Indeed, I wonder what kind of curry it is! Sonia!? You fell for it too!? CHAPTER 02 What's the scientific term for when you get hungry after you hear the word, "

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 6
item.description: CHAPTER 02 Oh, hi... Do you wanna talk to me, or...? CHAPTER 02 Hajime is annoying, but he’s not the worst guy around. I can spend some time with him. CHAPTER 02 ...I’m kinda hungry. Do you wanna go to the restaurant? CHAPTER 02 After getting some snacks from the restaurant, Hajime and I went to the courtyard and made ourselves comfortable by the pool.

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 5
item.description: CHAPTER 02 *Ding dong Bing bong * CHAPTER 02 Ahem... Hope's Peak Academy's School Trip Executive Committee has an announcement to make... Gooooood morning, everyone! Looks like today is gonna be another perfect, tropical day! Now then, let's show some enthusiasm and make sure to give it our all today! CHAPTER 02 Jeez.

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 4
item.description: CHAPTER 02 What the heck is this...? Such a gigantic building. CHAPTER 02 However, it is clearly faded... It looks like an ancient ruin. CHAPTER 02 It seems... Perhaps this is an actual ancient ruin? CHAPTER 02 U...Um...Does anyone else agree it looks a little like.

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 3
item.description: CHAPTER 02 The sign over there says... “diner”. I don’t know what that means, but judging by the outside of the building, I think this might be a restaurant. I should probably look inside... CHAPTER 02 Eh!? Of course, the one person that had to be here... CHAPTER 02 .

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 2
item.description: CHAPTER 02 Ah, so it’s true! The Monobeast that guarded this bridge is gone... ...and the bridge’s gate is open! Then, is what Monomi said really...? ...Nevermind that, what’s on the other side of this bridge? CHAPTER 02 So this is the new island...? It certainly... feels different from the first. There might be clues that could help us escape this place, or at the very least understand it.

item.title: Chapter 2 - Part 1
item.description: CHAPTER 2 BLUE AND ORANGE TIDES, HOODWINKED BY A LIVING GHOST CHAPTER 02 ...Mornin’, Mahiru. CHAPTER 02 Y-Yo... ... CHAPTER 02 G... Good morning... It was clear the events of yesterday were still heavy on everyone’s minds. Byakuya was killed... and his killer was Teruteru... And then Teruteru.

item.title: Command: Skip
item.description: CHAPTER 01 YAHOOOOOOOO!!! EXTREEEEEEEEEEEEME! CHAPTER 01 Kyaaaah! CHAPTER 01 Phew! I feel bad for anyone who missed out on that spectacle! CHAPTER 01 T-Teruteru! CHAPTER 01 Gh... oooohhhh...! A-Are you... fucking serious... ughhh...! CHAPTER 01 Ah.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 14
item.description: CHAPTER 01 Geh-hehe... it looks like your argument has come to a close. Oops! I lost control of my wild side for a second. Was that a side effect of the meat I just ate? ...Well, putting that aside, let's move along to the nerve-wracking voting time! Please pull the lever in front of you and cast your vote. CHAPTER 01 Ughhhh.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 13
item.description: CASE 01 THIS IS THE TRUTH! CASE 01 You hid the skewer inside that meat on the bone, didn’t you!? CASE 01 Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha-Wha!? CASE 01 What are you sayin'...? Dere's no way I'd hide anything... in a place like that.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 12
item.description: CASE 01 What're y'all even sayin' anymore!? I'm tellin' ya I was in dat dere dinin' hall durin' da blackou'! CASE 01 ...Where are you from again? CASE 01 Oooh I was born 'n West Azabu and raised 'n South Aoyama! CASE 01 Hey, you guys!

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 11
item.description: CASE 01 I don’t want to accuse anyone... Not again... CASE 01 But... I have no choice. CASE 01 The killer used the fire doors to block off the corridor, and moved through the darkness using my camera... CASE 01 Then they snuck into the crawlspace, used the glow-in-the-dark paint as a landmark.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 10
item.description: CASE 01 During the party, the killer... CASE 01 ...waslurking under the floor like a cockroach. CASE 01 They could've stared at panties all day... CASE 01 ...without going to the storage room in the dark! CASE 01 Is that true, Fuyuhiko!

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 9
item.description: CASE 01 Well, what now? CASE 01 If the knife isn't the murder weapon, there's no definitive proof that I'm the killer. CASE 01 Then what the hell was all that before...? CASE 01 Y-You say you were shoved away, but...you can't actually prove it, right?

item.title: Trial 1 - Intermission
item.description: CASE 01 Phew... It’s taken a long time to get here, hasn’t it? Did you need a moment to clear your head? You could put it that way. Phuhu... It seems hunger makes you do crazy things, ‘cause that fruit nearly blindsided me! Hueh? Can you imagine? Abandoning this killing game... leaving its students to enjoy their holiday in peace.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 8
item.description: CASE 01 I-I think it's strange that... CASE 01 The killer is so obviously Nagito! CASE 01 U-Um... CASE 01 He has already confessed... CASE 01 Um... You know... CASE 01 That bastard Nagito is the one who did it!

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 7
item.description: CASE 01 Let’s cut to the chase... You’re correct! It was my doing all along! CASE 01 I’m the one who hid the knife under the table before the party started. CASE 01 I’m the one who used the power cord to find my way to the table in the dark.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 6
item.description: CASE 01 A clue, you say? CASE 01 Do you know who the killer is? CASE 01 I have an inkling, yeah... but I wanna know what you guys think. CASE 01 Then tell us. What is this damning clue? CASE 01 I want to talk about how the killer got to the knife during the blackout.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 5
item.description: CASE 01 If the irons in the storage room caused the blackout... CASE 01 Then for the killer to turn the irons on... CASE 01 You're saying they went all the way to the storage room? CASE 01 Then that means everyone who was in the dining hall.

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 4
item.description: CASE 01 Everyone except Peko was in the hall after the party started, right? CASE 01 I see... So there's no way anybody else could've locked themselves in the bathroom except Peko. CASE 01 I-I guess that would be... true... CASE 01 Y-You locked yourself in the commode?

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 3
item.description: CASE 01 Be careful! The first kill will happen tonight. Someone will definitely kill someone. CASE 01 Hey... The hell is this...? CASE 01 Mahiru and I found this in Byakuya's cottage. CASE 01 It... appears to be a threat someone sent to Byakuya. CASE 01 So who's this someone?

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 2
item.description: CASE 01 I'm sure Byakuya ducked under the table... CASE 01 ...during the blackout. CASE 01 That sounds correct! CASE 01 If that's the case... CASE 01 During the blackout, Mr. Ham Hands... CASE 01 .

item.title: Trial 1 - Part 1
item.description: CASE 01 Now then, let's begin with a simple explanation of the class trial. CASE 01 During the class trial, you will present your arguments for who the killer is, and vote for "whodunnit." If you vote correctly, then only the blackened will receive punishment. But if you pick the wrong person... CASE 01 I'll punish everyone *besides* the blackened, and that person will earn the right to leave this island!

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 19
item.description: CHAPTER 01 ... Hmm, just as I thought. It seems there's no way to get under the floor from inside this old building...maybe. Yeah, just like Nagito said... I guess that means Gundham will have to give up on his stupid earring. CHAPTER 01 Hajime, I trust you’ve been looking at those photos?

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 18
item.description: CHAPTER 01 What? You’re here? ...What’s your problem? Leave me alone. ... After everything that’s happened, I’d completely forgotten about our argument. Hearing his voice again pissed me off... but for Byakuya’s sake, I had to be the bigger person. Don’t give me that attitude right now. You must have heard Monokuma’s announcement, right? CHAPTER 01 Of course I did.

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 17
item.description: CHAPTER 01 The old building's circuit breaker should be inside this office. They probably have something to do with the outage, right? Right... so we should check it out first. CHAPTER 01 So, those are the circuit breakers? The power outage must have happened because they were tripped somehow... Hmm, it doesn't look like someone did anything to it.

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 16
item.description: CHAPTER 01 Um... There is something I want to ask you. What’s the matter? Um... CHAPTER 01 It appears that only that wall is a different color and material... Why is that? Oh, it's probably a fire door. ...Fire door? Eh? You’ve never seen one before? It's a door that shuts to keep fire from spreading by containing it.

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 15
item.description: CHAPTER 01 ... Hey, Mahiru... check out the table over there. Eh? Chiaki pointed to the table in the middle of the room. CHAPTER 01 M-My camera!? CHAPTER 01 Would you look at that? You must have placed it there and forgotten about it. I-I'd know better than to abandon my stuff at a busy party!

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 14
item.description: CHAPTER 01 My entire world had come grinding to a halt. The scene in front of me was so intense... so overwhelming... It bled over me, wrapped itself around me, and all I could do... was scream. CHAPTER 01 NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO! Byaku...ya...? Wh-Why is Byakuya...? CHAPTER 01 As the others rushed past me to look at the body, I remained firmly in place.

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 13
item.description: CHAPTER 01 I’m supposed to go outside, but... I still want to do a brief scan of the corridors. Maybe the people here have turned up something... CHAPTER 01 Teruteru, you’re searching the kitchen? ...Yeah, of course. Man, that blackout totally surprised me... It doesn’t look like Byakuya is here. We should look elsewhere.

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 12
item.description: CHAPTER 01 Why is Mikan... posed like that!? Is this what Hajime meant about her falling over!? I-I'm sorry! I tripped again! How do you trip and land like *that*? Yaaaay, an erotic pose! That's obviously a fanservice moment! Eek... Nooooo... P-Please don't! Please don't look at me! Eeeeeeee-hehehehe! I can't take this at all.

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 11
item.description: CHAPTER 01 Ah, they’re here! CHAPTER 01 Hey, let's eat already! I'm starvin'! CHAPTER 01 ...Where’s Teruteru? He should be here as well. I thought he was following us...? CHAPTER 01 Mmm, it’s a little thing called “fashionably late”. CHAPTER 01 There you are.

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 10
item.description: CHAPTER 01 ...Thank you for waiting.Teruteru is in the kitchen, and... it appears Fuyuhiko did not come. CHAPTER 01 I apologize. I did inform him about the party, but...Hey, you don’t need to apologize. It's his fault for not coming... CHAPTER 01 I explicitly stated that attendance was mandatory, but...It's fine... If just one person is absent, that shouldn't pose a problem....He won't be able to do anything.

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 9
item.description: CHAPTER 01 *Ding dong Bing bong* CHAPTER 01 This is an announcement from Hope’s Peak Academy’s Field Trip Executive Committee...It is now 10pm.Please rest peacefully, along with the soothing sound of the waves.Well then, pleasant dreams. Goodnight... CHAPTER 01 ...Right... So I’m supposed to be going to the old building, aren’t I?The moments before a party are arguably the most exciting, anticipation being greater than the event and all.

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 8
item.description: CHAPTER 01 ...Unusually, Chiaki wasn't playing any games.Um, how are you Chiaki?.......Good.O-Okay.... CHAPTER 01 You want to hang out?I guess we could play some games together. You know how to play the games here, right? CHAPTER 01 Chiaki showed me how to play some of the games in the lobby. It quickly became apparent why she’s called the UltimateGamer... CHAPTER 01 Chiaki and I grew a little closer today.

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 7
item.description: CHAPTER 01 When I entered the restaurant, I found several people already waiting inside. CHAPTER 01 ... CHAPTER 01 ... CHAPTER 01 ...Everyone looked exhausted... It seems I wasn’t alone in having a rough night’s sleep.Not wanting to disturb anyone, I quietly took to a corner of the restaurant and waited for the others to arrive. CHAPTER 01 .

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 6
item.description: CHAPTER 01 *Ding dong Bing bong* CHAPTER 01 Ahem... Hope's Peak Academy's School Trip Executive Committee has an announcement to make...Gooooood morning, everyone! Looks like today is gonna be another perfect, tropical day!Now then, let's show some enthusiasm and make sure to give it our all today! CHAPTER 01 ...Ah.I sat up in my bed, my head still throbbing from yesterday.I’d tossedand turned all night, unable to think of anything except last night’s events.

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 5
item.description: CHAPTER 01 Um...Uwa!It looked like you guys were arguing...so I wasn't sure when to actually show up... It looks like I showed up at an awkward time! CHAPTER 01 ...Why... are you dressed like that? CHAPTER 01 Oh, didn't I mention it in my recent broadcast? It's my costume for the fun time! CHAPTER 01 Oh, don't tell me you're going to.

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 4
item.description: CHAPTER 01 ....It’d be boring to just remain in my room...There’s plenty of time left in the day. Maybe I should spend it with someone... CHAPTER 01 Byakuya is very reliable. As expected of the Ultimate Affluent Progeny.With everyone working together under such a splendid leader, we'll be able to overcome any difficulty! CHAPTER 01 Then let's do what we can, just as our leader ordered us to do.

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 3
item.description: CHAPTER 01 ...Eh!? Whatis thatthing!?T-This... wasn’t here when we came to the park before, was it!? CHAPTER 01 No...I'm pretty sure it wasn't! CHAPTER 01 I found it this morning...when I was exploring the island one more time. It's unknown...when it was actually placed here... CHAPTER 01 Monokuma must have placed this object... CHAPTER 01 It looks like a clock.

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 2
item.description: CHAPTER 01 You’re late, you two. CHAPTER 01 Huh? What’s the matter with Kazuichi? CHAPTER 01 Sniff... CHAPTER 01 Kyahaha! Even though you look all flashy, you're actually a big coward!Are you gonna be okaaaay? People like you are usually the first victim, you know? CHAPTER 01 N... No they aren’t! Don’t say stuff like that! CHAPTER 01 Anyway, Byakuya.

item.title: Chapter 1 - Part 1
item.description: CHAPTER 1 A MOST DESPAIR FILLED GAME CHAPTER 01 This... this is unbelievable. Someone’s got to be pulling my leg here.Maybe it’s me. Maybe this is all one big demented dream.If it is, I’d do anything to wake up right now.As I triedto put my fragmented thoughts into words, something trickled down my spine.A familiar tingling sensation......Goosebumps. There were goosebumps all over my body. CHAPTER 01 I switch off the tablet and look up from where I’m sitting.

item.title: Prologue - Part 11
item.description: PROLOGUE I’ve seen so many ridiculous things on this island... But this... this puts everything else to shame. PROLOGUE Huh...huh...? PROLOGUE H...How did those statues just...!? PROLOGUE They’re not statues! They’re Monobeasts! PROLOGUE M...MONSTEEEEEEEEEERS!!! PROLOGUE No, I just said they’re Monobeasts! PROLOGUE At that moment, I should have been terrified.

item.title: Prologue - Part 10
item.description: PROLOGUE W-Where are you?! Where are you hiding!?Why are you yelling? What’s going on!?Hey! Show yourself!Show yourself?U-Usami, who are you talking to? PROLOGUE Puhuhuhu!...Huh?Ahhhh-hahahahahahaha! PROLOGUE Why, hello there! Thank you all for waiting!Long time, no see guys!I am Monokuma! I’m the headmaster of this academy! PROLOGUE Ahem, now that I have made my dashing appearance, the first thing I need to say is.

item.title: Prologue - Part 9
item.description: PROLOGUE Anyway, Usami! What's this present you mentioned in your announcement earlier? PROLOGUE Ah, that's right! Well, of course I didn't forget... PROLOGUE Love! Love! This is it! Don't be upset! I've prepared one for you all, so don't worry! PROLOGUE ...What is this...? PROLOGUE Pfft, teehee! It's an Usami Strap! If you squeeze the tummy, it talks.

item.title: Prologue - Part 8
item.description: PROLOGUE Mahiru... it looks like if we cross that bridge, we’ll reach another island not far from here.Another island... Do you think it’s safe?I can’t say. I’ve yet to explore it.Well, I guess we can check it out ourselves...But, you better have a backup plan in case things go wrong!While I’m sure there’s nothing to fear... I’ll think up a plan B, just for you.So he wouldn’t bother if I wasn’t here?

item.title: Prologue - Part 7
item.description: PROLOGUE Oh... it’s a restaurant. PROLOGUE It’s enormous. We could easily hold a banquet here. It kind of has this tropical, open country feeling.Open? You realise we’re trapped on an island, right? PROLOGUE Are we really trapped...?Are you for real? What else could it be!? PROLOGUE ............Oh well. We can talk about it after we’ve finished introducing ourselves.

item.title: Prologue - Part 6
item.description: PROLOGUE Huh... Compared to the weirdos I’ve met so far, this guy looks pretty normal.Hey, you... We haven’t introduced ourselves, have we? PROLOGUE Yeah... we haven’t.By the way, aren’t you the girl who fainted on the beach?Did you really have to remind me? PROLOGUE Sorry, I just wanted to see if you were okay.“Okay?” Jeez... I’ll be okay when I’m off this island.

item.title: Prologue - Part 5
item.description: PROLOGUE Peeking, peeking... PROLOGUE Oh haiiiiiiiiiii! I don’t know you!Um... hello. My name is Mahiru Koizumi, and- PROLOGUE Hellooooo? Your tension is super low! Are you feeling alright?Ah, that's right! Introductions are a go-go! PROLOGUE "I," "Buki," "Mio," "Da!" Put it together and what do you get? Ibuki Mioda! PROLOGUE Ibuki Mioda? I swear I know that name.

item.title: Prologue - Part 4
item.description: PROLOGUE Ah! This is an airport, isn’t it? And... are those......Airplanes!?Those are airplanes! Does this mean we can fly off of this island!? PROLOGUE Pains me to say, but... ‘fraid not.If they were damaged, I could fix 'em, but it looks like these planes are just for show...Huh? Just for show? PROLOGUE The engines have been completely removed. I can do a lot of things, but.

item.title: Prologue - Part 3
item.description: PROLOGUE Hey...Can you hear me...? PROLOGUE Hey, are you alright?...You seem pretty out of it.To be honest, I’m also... No, everyone else feels the same, too............Hey, are you listening?........ PROLOGUE Hey, are you sure you're okay?Ah... I think so... PROLOGUE Alright, I’m glad......... PROLOGUE Golden sand... blue sea...Strong, bright sunlight blazing down... and a gentle sea breeze caressing my skin.

item.title: Prologue - Part 2
item.description: PROLOGUE What...is that...?I... I think it’s a stuffed animal... That’s right, I am a squeezably soft stuffed animal.“Magical Miracle Girl ★ Usami”... A.K.A. Usami!I may not look like it, but I am your squeezably soft teacher.Nice to meet you all! PROLOGUE H-Huh? Am I hallucinating? Am I the only one who's seeing this? PROLOGUE Nah, I see it too... PROLOGUE What's with this talkin' Chihuahua!

item.title: Prologue - Part 1
item.description: PROLOGUE That day wasn’t just another regular day for me.No... it was more nerve-wracking than I could have ever anticipated. PROLOGUE The reality of the situation didn’t set in until I was actually standing in front of the building.Adrenaline began to rush through me, as if I was committing a horrible crime.Something... completely unlike transferring to a new school. PROLOGUE Then again, people have always told me this schoolis far from ordinary.
